mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice( title, content, writer, created_date ) VALUES( #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT notice_no, title, content, writer, created_date, modified_date FROM notice WHERE notice_no > 0 ORDER BY notice_no DESC, created_date DESC
SELECT notice_no, title, content, writer, created_date, modified_date FROM notice WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, writer = #{writer}, modified_date = now() WHERE notice_no = #{noticeNo}
